channel.title: I HAVE A PROBLEM! lol again
channel.description:
Okay...
I made a shop with silab items...now I tried 2 NPCs that have the "trade" option...and when I trade them I just disconnect any help on how to stop disconnecting???

item.title: I HAVE A PROBLEM! lol again
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

Then you haven’t added the correct code to client.java and/or shops.cfg

Read full topic
